title: Pomodoro timer start and countdown
description: Verify the Pomodoro timer starts correctly and counts down from 25 minutes to 0 with accurate time updates.

steps.description: Open the app and locate the Pomodoro timer
Click the start/play button to begin the timer
Confirm timer begins counting down from 25:00
Validate the timer updates every second decrementing accurately

title: Pomodoro timer pause and resume
description: Ensure the Pomodoro timer pauses when the pause button is pressed and resumes from the paused time.

steps.description: Start the Pomodoro timer
Click the pause button mid-session
Confirm the timer countdown halts immediately
Click the play button to resume the timer
Verify timer resumes countdown from paused time accurately

title: Pomodoro timer reset functionality
description: Verify that clicking reset mid-session stops the timer and resets it back to 25 minutes.

steps.description: Start the Pomodoro timer
Click the reset button before session completes
Confirm timer stops and resets to 25:00

title: Plant growth advances after full session completion
description: Check that the plant growth stage advances to the next image only after a full 25-minute session completes without interruption.

steps.description: Start and allow the Pomodoro timer to run until 0:00 without pausing or resetting
Verify that the plant image changes from start to middle growth stage

title: Plant growth resets and popup appears on pause mid-session
description: Verify that pausing the timer mid-session triggers 'Your plant died!' popup and resets plant growth to start image.

steps.description: Start the Pomodoro timer
Pause the timer before session completes
Confirm the modal popup with text 'Your plant died!' appears
Verify the plant resets to start growth image

title: Plant growth resets and popup appears on reset mid-session
description: Check that resetting the timer mid-session shows the 'Your plant died!' modal and resets plant growth to start stage.

steps.description: Start the Pomodoro timer
Click reset before session completes
Confirm modal popup 'Your plant died!' is displayed
Verify plant growth resets to initial stage

title: To-do list add task with Enter key
description: Verify users can add new tasks to the to-do list by typing and pressing Enter key, and tasks appear correctly in the list.

steps.description: Focus on the to-do list input field
Type a new task and press Enter
Confirm the new task appears in the to-do list panel

title: To-do list remove tasks using trash button
description: Verify that clicking the trash button next to a task removes it from the to-do list immediately.

steps.description: Add one or more tasks to the to-do list
Click the trash/delete button next to a task
Confirm the selected task is removed from the list

title: To-do list data persistence across sessions
description: Validate that tasks added to the to-do list persist and are restored correctly after closing and reopening the app.

steps.description: Add tasks in the to-do list
Close the app or reload the page
Verify the previously added tasks remain visible in the to-do list

title: Session completion count and progress dots update correctly
description: Ensure that after each fully completed Pomodoro session, the session count increments, and corresponding progress dots update visually.

steps.description: Complete one full Pomodoro session without pause or reset
Verify the sessions completed count increments by one
Confirm that a progress dot is highlighted or added representing this session

title: Plant blooms after three completed sessions and resets correctly
description: Verify that after three full Pomodoro sessions, the plant image shows full bloom, user is prompted to start over, and the plant growth and session counts reset accordingly without affecting to-do list.

steps.description: Complete three full Pomodoro sessions
Verify the plant shows the full bloom (end) image
Confirm a prompt is displayed to start over with a new seed
Acknowledge the prompt to reset
Validate the session count resets to zero and plant stage resets to start image
Verify the existing to-do list tasks remain unchanged

title: Plant growth does not advance for incomplete sessions
description: Ensure that the plant growth stage does not advance if a Pomodoro session is interrupted by pause or reset and not completed fully.

steps.description: Start a Pomodoro session and pause or reset before completion
Confirm plant growth stage does not progress from the current state

title: Pomodoro timer handles edge case at 0 seconds
description: Verify that the timer stops exactly at 0:00 without going into negative time and triggers expected session completion behavior.

steps.description: Start the Pomodoro timer and let it count down to 0:00
Ensure timer displays 0:00 and does not show negative values
Confirm session completion procedures trigger, including plant growth advancement and session count increment

title: UI styling and component rendering correctness
description: Validate that the user interface elements are styled as per Tailwind CSS design, including timer, plant images, modal, to-do panel, and progress dots, and that the app runs smoothly without console errors.

steps.description: Load the application in supported browsers
Verify all UI components render correctly as per design specs
Check for presence and correct styling of timer, plant images, to-do panel, modal popups, and progress dots
Open developer console and verify no error logs appear during usage
